title: Clean-Up Day at El Ejido Park
description: Join us for a morning of cleaning and beautifying El Ejido Park. All supplies will be provided.

title: Tutoring for Underprivileged Children
description: Volunteer to help local children improve their reading and math skills. No prior experience required.

title: Food Drive Distribution in Guayaquil
description: Help distribute food kits to families in need. A small act of kindness goes a long way.

title: Visit to Elderly Home
description: Spend quality time with elderly residents—play games, share stories, and spread love.

title: Beach Clean-Up in Salinas
description: Help keep our coast clean by collecting trash along the beach. Gloves and bags provided.

title: Animal Shelter Volunteer Day
description: Assist in feeding, grooming, and walking rescued animals. A great way to give back to our furry friends.

title: Tree Planting in Cumbayá
description: Join a reforestation effort by planting native trees. Tools and lunch will be provided.

title: Workshop: Digital Literacy for Seniors
description: Teach seniors how to use smartphones, social media, and online tools in this tech-friendly workshop.
